answers.answer: The word "best" is subjective. I don't feel there is a "best" of anything. There are lots of goods and greats and recommended but not everyone will agree on what is "the best." With that in mind I suggest you start here http://www.diabetes.org/food-nutrition-lifestyle/nutrition.jsp . Scroll down to "What can I eat?" and "My Food Advisor" for tips.I found 675,00 hits on diabetes nutrition by Googling those words alone. http://tinyurl.com/5t5qxz

question: As  a diabetic  what  is  the  best  diabetes diet?
title: what  is  the   best diabetes diet.
